about_the_game:
With tons of action and adrenaline, we bring you only the most exciting part of arcade soccer!
Play in single-player mode or local multiplayer. You can even share the game using Remote Play Together!
Up to 4 players can enjoy playing competitively or cooperatively across any game mode.

Play modes:


  1. Friendly match and penalty shootouts
  2. Tournaments - play the most important competitions!
  3. Career Mode! - create your team from scratch and lead it to glory!
  4. Themed Events - crazy game modes with amazing characters.
  5. Party tournaments - have fun with friends and family!

Store:


As you play, you'll earn coins, which you can use in the store to purchase original items, such as balls, flags, stadiums, and also cosmetics for your players and teams... from unique hairstyles to a lion costume, anything is possible!

Available tournaments:


  • Charrua Tournament and Charrua A and B Leagues
  • European, American and Asian Cups
  • Olymcharrua Cups (male and female)
  • Global Cup (male and female)
  • Global Cup 1930 (evoking the first international cup with a retro touch)
  • USA Leagues (male and female), Eurochamp League and Liberty Cup

Characteristics:


  • Easy to learn and enjoy, with clean and challenging gameplay.
  • Two controls modes, to suit occasional players and also more experienced ones.
  • Configurable assisted mode, to help you in the actions you prefer or disable it to increase the challenge.
  • Fouls, free kicks, yellow and red cards, injuries, and penalties!

  • Women's, men's, and mixed soccer.
  • Short, long or through passes... directed, controlled or elevated shots... and also Chilean kicks, scorpion, scissors, pigeon header, etc.
  • Manage team formation and strategy, player changes and much more.



Whether you are a soccer fan or not so much, this game will keep you entertained for hours!
Do you have what it takes to become a champion?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam Deck, Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least 1 (one) controller is required for local multiplayer gaming in addition to the default keyboard support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+ (Intel) | Big Sur 11.0 (Apple silicon M1)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support (Intel) Apple M1 or above
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least 1 (one) controller is required for local multiplayer gaming in addition to the default keyboard support

name: Charrua Soccer - Pro Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least 1 (one) controller is required for local multiplayer gaming in addition to the default keyboard support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Soccer for people who think they don’t like soccer”
Leif Johnson / Macworld

“Charrua Soccer: Arcade soccer in its purest state”
Raúl Estrada / digitaltrends
short_description: With lots of action and adrenaline, Charrua Soccer is an arcade that brings you only the most fun part of soccer! Play friendly matches, tournaments or create your team and lead it to glory in career mode! Have fun playing alone or with friends, in competitive or cooperative mode!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
